Description: View in an Italian town; the corner of a street, rising by steps at centre, the walls of a house at right overgrown with foliage, a disused fountain at left surmounted by a small column, a gateway, walls and towers beyond Brush drawing in grey wash, over black chalk
Bibliographic references: Hind 1915-31 / Catalogue of Dutch and Flemish Drawings preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (17)
Exhibition history: 2004-2005 Oct-Jan, Birmingham, Barber Inst of Fine Arts, 'Bartolomeus Breenbergh 'Joseph in Egypt'
